translations: n.稀树大草原（savannah  的复数）

sentences.sentence: Cats are typically known for being very inquisitive and so are the Savannahs.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，猫的好奇心很强，萨凡纳人也是如此。

sentences.sentence: Knowledge of iron making penetrated into the forest and savannahs of West Africa at roughly the same time that iron making was reaching Europe.
sentences.translation: 大约在制铁技术传到欧洲的同时，西非的森林和大草原上也开始有了制铁的知识。

sentences.sentence: The savannahs are tall and slim and can weigh up to nine point one kilograms, making them one of the largest breeds of cats that people can own.
sentences.translation: 萨凡纳猫又高又瘦，体重可达9.1公斤，是人类能养的最大的猫科动物之一。
